title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, braking frequently
caption: A white car drives slowly on a rainy night in a city street, with many other cars and pedestrians around.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and visibility is low. The ego vehicle is driving slowly and braking frequently. There are many other cars and pedestrians on the street, and some of them are also braking or stopping. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and they are showing red or green lights.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and braking frequently because of the rainy and slippery road conditions. The driver is being cautious and paying attention to the other vehicles and pedestrians around. The frequent braking events indicate that the traffic is heavy and congested, and the driver needs to be patient and attentive to avoid any accidents or collisions.
